languages.text: "По пути сюда мы столкнулись с вопиющим поведением местных. Нас даже пытались забросать подручным хламом".
"We encountered some locals on our way here. Their conduct was outrageous — they even tried to throw things at us."
languages.original_text: "По пути сюда мы столкнулись с вопиющим поведением местных. Нас даже пытались забросать подручным хламом".

traits.locale_text: "We encountered some locals on our way here. Their conduct was outrageous — they even tried to throw things at us."
"We encountered some locals on our way here. Their conduct was outrageous — they even tried to throw things at us."
"We encountered some locals on our way here. Their conduct was outrageous — they even tried to throw things at us."
"We encountered some locals on our way here. Their conduct was outrageous — they even tried to throw things at us."

languages.text: “我们来这里的路上遇到了一部分这里的船员。他们甚至打算朝我们扔东西，这种行为实在是让人无法容忍。”
languages.original_text: "We encountered some locals on our way here. Their conduct was outrageous — they even tried to throw things at us."

traits.locale_text: “我们来这里的路上遇到了一部分这里的船员。他们甚至打算朝我们扔东西，这种行为实在是让人无法容忍。”

languages.text: «Nos encontramos con algunos habitantes por el camino. Su conducta era intolerable; incluso intentaron lanzarnos cosas».
languages.original_text: "We encountered some locals on our way here. Their conduct was outrageous — they even tried to throw things at us."

traits.locale_text: «Nos encontramos con algunos habitantes por el camino. Su conducta era intolerable; incluso intentaron lanzarnos cosas».

languages.text: 「ここに来る途中で現地の人々と遭遇したが、あまりにも無礼な振る舞いだった…我々に物を投げつけようとさえしたのだ」
languages.original_text: "We encountered some locals on our way here. Their conduct was outrageous — they even tried to throw things at us."

traits.locale_text: 「ここに来る途中で現地の人々と遭遇したが、あまりにも無礼な振る舞いだった…我々に物を投げつけようとさえしたのだ」

languages.text: "Wir sind auf dem Weg einigen Einheimischen begegnet. Ihr Verhalten war unerhört — sie haben sogar versucht, uns mit Dingen zu bewerfen."
languages.original_text: "We encountered some locals on our way here. Their conduct was outrageous — they even tried to throw things at us."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind auf dem Weg einigen Einheimischen begegnet. Ihr Verhalten war unerhört — sie haben sogar versucht, uns mit Dingen zu bewerfen."

languages.text: « Nous avons croisé des ouvriers en chemin. Ils nous ont très mal accueillis... Nous avons même essuyé une pluie de projectiles. »
languages.original_text: "We encountered some locals on our way here. Their conduct was outrageous — they even tried to throw things at us."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons croisé des ouvriers en chemin. Ils nous ont très mal accueillis... Nous avons même essuyé une pluie de projectiles. »

languages.text: "Buraya gelirken ahaliden kimselerle karşılaştık. Taşkınca davranışlarda bulundular. Bize bir şeyler fırlatmaya dahi kalkıştılar."
languages.original_text: "We encountered some locals on our way here. Their conduct was outrageous — they even tried to throw things at us."

traits.locale_text: "Buraya gelirken ahaliden kimselerle karşılaştık. Taşkınca davranışlarda bulundular. Bize bir şeyler fırlatmaya dahi kalkıştılar."
